summary: Diff implements parts of the admin access guard and several admin pages with safer loading/error states, plus a reusable AdminCapabilityNotice. However, the diff evidence does not show completion of the full required admin room set, invite accept flow, approvals/editing flows, or comprehensive admin navigation verification across all required rooms. The diff also includes multiple unrelated feature changes (Hero, HeroHelper, Wallet/CreditCard, styling/theme, assets/text), which are outside the requested admin restoration scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Header Admin dropdown and /admin/rooms hub must include links to every required admin room; links must match registered routes; navigation usable on desktop/mobile (scrollable).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary claims Header/App changes, but no concrete diff content is provided for Header.tsx/App.tsx/adminNav constants or the /admin/rooms hub UI itself. Also, there is no evidence that the dropdown/hub includes links to *every* required room (approvals, editing, uploads, pricing/terms, price control, image library, wallet management, ads, affiliate, member directory, invite links, display screen, mall admin).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions Header.tsx and App.tsx changes but provides no actual link list/paths)

missing_requirements.requirement: Every /admin/* route must be guarded; non-admin/logged-out users see existing AdminAccessDenied; admin checks resilient to identity changes without hard refresh.
missing_requirements.reason: AdminRouteGuard and useAdminStatus improvements are shown, but there is no diff evidence that *every* /admin/* route is wrapped/guarded (router configuration in App.tsx is not shown, only described in a summary).
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (claims App.tsx wraps admin routes, but no code shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: All required admin rooms must be present and routable (approvals dashboards, editing room, uploads, pricing/terms, price control, image library, wallet management, ads, affiliate, member directory, invite links, display screen, mall admin) with safe loading/empty/error states; primary actions work end-to-end where supported (notably invite links accept flow, approvals/editing approve/reject flows, uploads/image library flows, pricing save, display updates, mall CRUD).
missing_requirements.reason: Only three admin pages are evidenced as modified (AdminAdsPage, AdminAffiliatePage, AdminMemberDirectoryPage). There is no diff evidence of routes/pages for approvals dashboards, editing room, uploads, pricing/terms, price control, image library, wallet management, invite links (+ /invite/accept flow), display screen, or mall admin, nor evidence of their required action flows.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (does not show implementation for the other required rooms or /invite/accept)

missing_requirements.requirement: Prevent regressions: no new console errors on core non-admin routes; existing public/auth navigation continues to work; admin changes do not break Internet Identity login/logout flow and do not require refresh after auth changes.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff includes broad, unrelated modifications to many non-admin areas (Hero, content components, Footer, Wallet/CreditCard pages, CSS/theme, Tailwind config). The diff summary does not provide evidence of regression testing or guarantees that these changes introduce no new console errors on the listed core routes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (lists many non-admin component/page changes unrelated to admin restoration)

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; explicitly outside the admin restoration scope and likely a new unrelated product feature.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; unrelated to completing/fixing the Admin area.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; outside admin restoration scope.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested (admin navigation/rooms were requested, not a new footer admin login entry).
